title: taNikaiyurai murugan
sahitya:
taNikaiyurai murugan tannai aNuguvOrin piNi tIrap-pEraruL purindu varuginrAn


anupallavi

  iNaiyaDi tanadait-tEDi tuNai purindiDak-kOri paNindiDum bhaktarai aNaittATkoLLum


caraNam    kurai paTTuLLam kodittiDat-tighaittu muraiyiTTut-tanadu urutuNai tanaip-pera
tiraLAgha dinamtOrum varum toNDar uyya karuNaiyODu viraivil aravaNaikk-umaiyan
